verses.verse: "Moreover you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> with <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3407>curtains;<s%> of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> with <S%H4639>cherubim.<s%> The work of the <S%H2803>skillful<s%> <S%H4639>workman<s%> you shall make <S%H6213>them.<s%>

The <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> shall be <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits:<s%> all the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> shall have <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure.<s%>

<S%H2568>Five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> shall be coupled <S%H2266>together<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> to <S%H269>another;<s%> and the other <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> shall be <S%H2266>coupled<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> to <S%H269>another.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%> on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> from the <S%H7098>edge<s%> in the <S%H2279>coupling;<s%> and likewise you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> in the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that is <S%H7020>outmost<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H4225>coupling.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> in the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain,<s%> and you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> in the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that is in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H4225>coupling.<s%> The <S%H3924>loops<s%> shall be <S%H6901>opposite<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> to <S%H269>another.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H7165>clasps<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H2266>couple<s%> the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> one to another <S%H802>with<s%> the <S%H7165>clasps:<s%> and the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> shall be a <S%H259>unit.<s%>

"You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of <S%H5795>goats<s%>' hair for a <S%H168>covering<s%> over the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%> You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H3407>curtains.<s%>

The <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> shall be <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits:<s%> the <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> shall have <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure.<s%>

You shall <S%H2266>couple<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> by <S%H8337>themselves,<s%> and six <S%H3407>curtains<s%> by <S%H3717>themselves,<s%> and shall double over the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> in the <S%H4136>forefront<s%> of the <S%H168>tent.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that is <S%H7020>outmost<s%> in the <S%H2279>coupling,<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> which is outmost in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2279>coupling.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H7165>clasps<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and <S%H935>put<s%> the <S%H7165>clasps<s%> into the <S%H3924>loops,<s%> and <S%H2266>couple<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H259>together,<s%> that it may be one.

The <S%H5629>overhanging<s%> part that <S%H5736>remains<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that <S%H5736>remains,<s%> shall <S%H5628>hang<s%> over the <S%H268>back<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

The <S%H520>cubit<s%> on the one <S%H2088>side,<s%> and the <S%H520>cubit<s%> on the other <S%H5736>side,<s%> of that which remains in the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> shall <S%H5628>hang<s%> over the <S%H6654>sides<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> on this side and on that <S%H3680>side,<s%> to cover it.

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4372>covering<s%> for the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H352>rams<s%>' <S%H5785>skins<s%> dyed <S%H119>red,<s%> and a <S%H4372>covering<s%> of sea <S%H8476>cow<s%> <S%H5785>hides<s%> <S%H4605>above.<s%>
"You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> standing <S%H5975>up.<s%>

<S%H6235>Ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> of a <S%H7175>board,<s%> and one and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H7175>board.<s%>

There shall be <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons<s%> in <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H7175>board,<s%> joined <S%H7947>to<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H269>another:<s%> thus you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> for all the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H8486>southward.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> under the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> for its <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> for its <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons.<s%>
For the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6763>side,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards,<s%>

and their <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board.<s%>
For the far <S%H3411>part<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7175>boards.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4742>corners<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> in the far <S%H3411>part.<s%>

They shall be <S%H8382>double<s%> <S%H4295>beneath,<s%> and in the same <S%H8382>way<s%> <S%H3162>they<s%> shall be whole to its <S%H7218>top<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2885>ring:<s%> thus shall it be for them <S%H8147>both;<s%> they shall be for the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4740>corners.<s%>

There shall be <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H7175>boards,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H134>sockets;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board.<s%>

"You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood:<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%>

and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> for the far <S%H3411>part<s%> <S%H3220>westward.<s%>
The <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H1280>bar<s%> in the <S%H8484>midst<s%> of the <S%H7175>boards<s%> shall <S%H1272>pass<s%> through from <S%H7097>end<s%> to <S%H7097>end.<s%>

You shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> their <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for <S%H1004>places<s%> for the <S%H1280>bars:<s%> and you shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
You shall set <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> according to the <S%H4941>way<s%> that it was <S%H7200>shown<s%> to you on the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

"You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H6532>veil<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> with <S%H3742>cherubim.<s%> The <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H2803>skillful<s%> workman shall it be <S%H6213>made.<s%>

You shall <S%H5414>hang<s%> it on <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> with <S%H2091>gold;<s%> their <S%H2053>hooks<s%> shall be of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> on <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

You shall hang <S%H5414>up<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> under the <S%H7165>clasps,<s%> and shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in there <S%H1004>within<s%> the <S%H6532>veil:<s%> and the <S%H6532>veil<s%> shall <S%H914>separate<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place from the <S%H6944>most<s%> holy for <S%H6944>you.<s%>
You shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> on the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in the <S%H6944>most<s%> holy <S%H6944>place.<s%>

You shall <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H6532>veil,<s%> and the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> over <S%H5227>against<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> on the <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> toward the <S%H8486>south:<s%> and you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6763>side.<s%>

"You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent,<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8438>scarlet,<s%> and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H7551>embroiderer.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> for the <S%H4539>screen<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold:<s%> their <S%H2053>hooks<s%> shall be of <S%H2091>gold:<s%> and you shall <S%H3332>cast<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of brass for <S%H5178>them.<s%>
